mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT perms FROM sys_user_role AS sur LEFT JOIN sys_role AS sr ON sr.id=sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu AS srm ON srm.role_id=sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS sm ON sm.id=srm.menu_id WHERE sur.user_id=#{id} AND sr.status=0 AND sm.status=0 AND sm.type=2;

SELECT DISTINCT sm.id,sm.parent_id,sm.menu_name,sm.path,sm.component,sm.visible,sm.type FROM sys_user_role AS sur LEFT JOIN sys_role AS sr ON sr.id=sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu AS srm ON srm.role_id=sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS sm ON sm.id=srm.menu_id WHERE sur.user_id=#{id} AND sr.status=0 AND sm.status=0 AND sm.type != 2;

SELECT DISTINCT sm.id,sm.parent_id,sm.menu_name,sm.path,sm.component,sm.visible,sm.type FROM sys_user_role AS sur LEFT JOIN sys_role AS sr ON sr.id=sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu AS srm ON srm.role_id=sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS sm ON sm.id=srm.menu_id WHERE sur.user_id=#{id} AND sr.status=0 AND sm.status=0 AND sm.type != 2 AND sm.parent_id=#{parentId};
